value.title: Working hours without Holidays, weekends and by country in power query
value.excerpt: In today's video we are going to write a function that calculates work hour (seconds) between two datetimes. Working hour by location, holidays will also be included :)  Link to Bills thread: https://social.technet.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/f3fc729e-a2ec-409a-b20e-b5cf8ff5dc2a/calculate-work-hours-between-two-timedate-stamps?forum=powerquery

value.title: Exclude Blank Records from Distinct Count in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to Wed with the DAX series. Today I’m going to explain one DAX function in Power BI which is – DISTINCTCOUNTNOBLANK()   When we use the DISTICTCOUNT() function in Power BI this will calculate distinct count for the column. This will also include Blank as a distinct record. As a result due to
